href=\"https://alohashoes.com/blogs/footwear-news/rubber\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Natural rubber</a> molded to fit your foot, live up to their name. These slippers are built solidly to withstand a hike through Oahu's lush Manoa Valley, are waterproof to endure a spontaneous swim, and are comfortable enough to wear through a night of studying at UH and beyond. The wide <a href=\"https://alohashoes.com/blogs/footwear-news/nylon-straps\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">nylon strap</a> ensures a snug but cushy non-slip fit. The Manoa is offered in three styles: classic Black, Huka, and Kanu. Be the shark in your pond with our Manoa slippers. The <b>Huka</b> design, reminiscent of the stylized hooks from ancient Polynesia, is perfect for the fishermen, the warriors, or for anyone who wants to put a little island twist in their step.</p>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li id=\"tab2\" style=\"display: none;\" class=\"\">\n<div>\n<ul>\n<li>Strong <a href=\"https://alohashoes.com/blogs/footwear-news/nylon-straps\" target=\"_blank\" Sport fishing is intense. These Scott Hawaii fishing sandals are the perfect choice on the boat or off the sea wall.</p>\n<p>It's a relief to know that the sport finally has the perfect boat sandal for protection and Hawaiian style. No matter whether you're wrangling a marlin off the coast or just planning a relaxing poolside afternoon, you'll be glad that the Hokulea slippers are a part of your wardrobe. The thick <a href=\"https://alohashoes.com/blogs/footwear-news/nylon-straps\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">nylon strap</a> creates a comfortable grip that conforms to your foot, while the arched, cushioned sole creates long-lasting support. Offered in four styles, the Hokulea will be a stylish addition to your collection in or out of the water.</p>\n<p>The Hokulea sandals come in four white bottom designs: Marlin, Mahi, Ahi, and Flag. The <b>Marlin </b>slippers are waterproof and slip-resistant, so these slippers are perfect for hooking a Marlin in the surf. worldwide. And more <a href=\"https://alohashoes.com/collections/rubber-sandals\" title=\"Beach Sandals | Mens Rubber Slippers Spring Sale\">Top Rated Natural Rubber Flip Flops</a> just arrived.<br> href=\"https://alohashoes.com/blogs/footwear-news/rubber\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Natural Rubber</a> outsole provides ultimate durability and resists scratches and other forms
